context: In 2015, Braze (founded 2011) was still an emerging player in the customer engagement space. The competitive landscape was dominated by established enterprise platforms like Salesforce Marketing Cloud and Adobe Marketing Cloud. 2015 also saw the launch of SendPulse, indicating growing interest in marketing automation and multi-channel engagement. At this time, the market was transitioning from traditional email marketing to more sophisticated omnichannel customer engagement platforms.
